div.p: Heracles to his dearest Musaeus, greetings. I request you to regard as introduced to you Dioscorus, who will deliver the letter to you; he is a very close friend of mine. By doing this, you will be conferring a favour on me. Farewell. Pharmuthi 13 (?).
To my dearest Musaeus. Translation: B.R. Rees, P.Herm. 1
